In response to the exponential increase in cases, the Iranian government closed all schools in the first week. By the end of the first week, Friday prayers were cancelled and all mosques were closed. In the second week, universities were closed and the government reduced the working hours. However, by the end of the second week, the virus spread to all provinces in Iran. The government then implemented ‘stay at home’ policies. Social network users created campaigns and public messaging to stay at home and do social distancing. In the second week,
